lexUnit.name: find_out.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: discover information or a fact.

sentence.text: When they were in the corridor , she said tartly , ` I can find my own way out .
Only then , from that , does he infer that there really is honey ; and this is what really distinguishes being told the truth from finding it out in other ways .
On the telly they just talk to people and find things out .
If an author says that a third of the present holders of dukedoms in Britain have been divorced we want to know how he found this out .
Finding this out is not a matter of one or two studies but can take many years .
` I did not want you to find out like this , " he said , more gently .
Come to our prayer group in July and find out which old and new friends we 'll be praying for then -- and bring your own suggestions and concerns .
He found out she was religious when she began to make him go to church with her on Sunday mornings .
They 'll find out it takes more than just a little hope
I found out that the captain and two of his men , all Americans , were n't on the ship last night , so I 'm sure they killed poor John Openshaw .
Meanwhile police are trying to find out who was driving the car when it travelled down the country lane to Stonebench .
Sent off for my tickets for the aforementioned match on Monday , only to find out on Tuesday that it 's been postponed ( effin Bright ) .
I have never been able to find out its origin . )
Never been able to find out where the smell comes from . "
Are you supposed to find out who killed Hereward or where Amy is ? "
Something dreadful happened to Adolph and I 'm going to find out what it was ! "
I want you to find out whether they 've kept any of their signing ability , and if so how much . "
And she did not want anyone to find out what she had done .
After I found out , I was n't so certain . "
“ I found out by accident . ”
` To be fair , Kitty told us you were listed as killed on the Marne and by the time anyone found out the truth it was too late . "
Children pick up on our worries and stress , so try to find out what 's bothering her and take time to reassure her .
